name: Pastel Memories
description:
This game was created as part of my bachelor's thesis  at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Pastel Memories tells the story of the protagonist, who returns to an old village after their great aunts death. By visiting places from their memories they discover new things about their great aunt Eileen.

Credits

Design, Art, Code by Carla Rother

Additional Code, Writing by Naomi Seeling

based on WFC by Marian Kleineberg https://github.com/marian42/wavefunctioncollapse

Supervised by

Prof. Florian Berger

Franziska Gödicke

Please restart the game if...

... you encounter floating flowers.

... the Loading Screen takes longer than 2 minutes.
